text.section: Unless otherwise provided in the schedule of taxes provided for in ยง2-2013, each privilege license issued shall cover the twelve-month period beginning June 1 of each calendar year and ending May 31 of the subsequent calendar year.
The privilege license tax is due on June 1 of each year. If, however, a person begins a business after June 1, the tax for that year must be paid before the business is begun.
The Revenue Collector shall not issue a license until the tax levied under ยง2-2013 has been paid.
